C

ContentMode - Enum in de.mrapp.android.sidebar
Contains all possible content modes, which specify how a sidebar's content view is handled when the sidebar becomes shown or hidden.
ContentOverlayAnimation - Class in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation
An animation, which allows to fade in or out the overlay, which is shown in front of a sidebar's content view, while the sidebar is shown.
ContentOverlayAnimation(ContentView, float, boolean) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation.ContentOverlayAnimation
Creates a new animation, which allows to fade in or out the overlay, which is shown in front of a sidebar's content view, while the sidebar is shown.
ContentView - Class in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view
A custom view, which contains the content view of a sidebar, as well as a view, which is used as an overlay, while the sidebar is shown.
ContentView(Context, Inflater, int) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view.ContentView
Creates a new custom view, which contains the content view of a sidebar, as well as a view, which is used as an overlay, while the sidebar is shown.
ContentViewResizeAnimation - Class in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation
An animation, which allows to resize a sidebar's content view, when the sidebar should be shown or hidden.
ContentViewResizeAnimation(ContentView, long, float, Location, float, boolean) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation.ContentViewResizeAnimation
Creates a new animation, which allows to resize a sidebar's content view, when the sidebar should be shown or hidden.
ContentViewScrollAnimation - Class in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation
An animation, which allows to move a sidebar's content view, when the sidebar should be shown or hidden.
ContentViewScrollAnimation(ContentView, long, float, float, float, boolean) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation.ContentViewScrollAnimation
Creates a new animation, which allows to move a sidebar's content view, when the sidebar should be shown or hidden.
createInflater(View) - Static method in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater.InflaterFactory
Creates and returns an inflater, which allows to inflate view, which are present as an instance of the class View.
createInflater(int) - Static method in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater.InflaterFactory
Creates and returns an inflater, which allows to inflate views, which may be referenced by a specific resource id.
CREATOR - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.savedstate.SidebarSavedState
A creator, which allows to create instances of the class SidebarSavedState from parcels.
